title: El Salvador frees 3 women who were sentenced to 30 years under anti-abortion laws
content:
1. El Salvador frees 3 women who were sentenced to 30 years under anti-abortion laws  NPR
  2. El Salvador Releases 3 Women Serving Long Prison Sentences for Abortions  The New York Times
  3. El Salvador frees three women convicted of abortions  Associated Press
  4. World Digest: Dec. 25, 2021  The Washington Post
  5. Abortion ban: El Salvador frees women jailed after miscarriages  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: エルサルバドル、中絶禁止法で30年の刑を宣告された女性3人を釈放
